data.message: Recently moving to Texas, we are able to walk the many streets in our large gated community almost everyday. Buttercup has made many 4 legged friends and we have had great conversations with their owners.  We all love it.  Greg and Cheryl

replies.message: That's so great, Gregory! We love to hear stories like this. Thanks for sharing with us. -Hailey
forget all that this phone does not say what I say. If you call LegalZoom what's an idea will they back you when you don't have any money to pay them back until the business gets running?
